name: Behind You (itch) (YapGamedev)
description:
In this game you have to explore the room in this game, if you see the letter Behind You. Don't look back =D Controls:
  • W.A.S.D : Walking / Moving
  • E : Interact
  • LMB : Interact
Dev Note:
  • This game is made to train my skills to make horror games, 
  • This game contains a light jumpscare that will only appear at the end of the game... Maybe =D
  • If you find a bug in this game, don't hesitate to comment, this game is still under development.
  • And also don't hesitate to make gameplay videos playing this game, I love watching it =D
Credits:
  • Ghast model by Patrix - sketchfab.com
  • Walking SFX by YT : Jacob Michael
  • Jumpscare SFXs: Minecraft Ghast
  • Textures by random google images
  • Game design : ME :D
  • Game programing : ME :D
  • Made with Unity3D 2021
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Made by YapGamedev
  • Developer spirit by You :D
Others:

Thank you for viewing this game page, if you are interested in this game download it now! This game is free and under 100MB in size!

IF YOU FOUND THIS GAME ON ANOTHER PLATFORM THAN ITCH.IO, PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO TELL ME, IT'S HIGHLY LIKELY NOT OFFICIAL YAPGAMEDEV, AND THEY REUPLAOAD MY GAME!

YapGamedev(Behind_You.Game).4-Jan-2023);
